body: #versionSpec:  # Optional  # A version or version range that specifies the NuGet version to make available on the path. Use x as a wildcard. See the [list of available NuGet versions](http://dist.nuget.org/tools.json).If you want to match a pre-release version, the specification must contain a major, minor, patch, and pre-release version from the list above.Examples: 4.x, 3.3.x, 2.8.6, >=4.0.0-0If unspecified, a version will be chosen automatically.

#checkLatest:  # Optional  # Always check for and download the latest available version of NuGet.exe which satisfies the version spec.Enabling this option could cause unexpected build breaks when a new version of NuGet is released.
NuGet tool installer.description: Acquires a specific version of NuGet from the internet or the tools cache and adds it to the PATH. Use this task to change the version of NuGet used in the NuGet tasks.
